statements.sql: select `A`.*, `B`.`title`, `B`.`description` from `photos` as `A` left join `photo_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`photo_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`type` = 'background' and `A`.`link` = 'http://localhost/laravel/begreen/tin-tuc/danh-muc-tin-tuc-1' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 1
hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
